Visual Analysis Module¶

Visualization utilities.

Functions to generate time series plots of dropout and performance rates by branch and save them as PNG files under src/img/.

src.modules.visual_analysis.plot_time_series_by_branch(merged_df, student_name='carlestrullas')¶

Plot and save time series by branch for dropout and performance.

Parameters:

  • merged_df (DataFrame) – Merged dataset created in exercise 2.

  • student_name (str) – Identifier used in the output filename.

Return type:

None

Returns:

None. Saves a PNG figure and prints its path.
